info.name: HttpOnly Cookie - Detect
author: mr. bobo hp
info.description: Checks whether cookies in the HTTP response contain the HttpOnly attribute. If the HttpOnly flag is set, it means that the cookie is HTTP-only

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: simulateurap.emploi.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Accept-Ranges: bytes Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 29 Oct 2023 05:37:18 GMT Etag: "1932-52e42e7d88800-gzip" Last-Modified: Thu, 17 Mar 2016 18:36:16 GMT Referrer-Policy: strict-origin Set-Cookie: BIGipServerpool-dgefp-simuap.cegedim.cloud-HTTP=!yqvYL/uo7maRYHYm0zi0rVXmcSp4PYrXruRoolOtUEMtaJc98wFGMtGTreLMJo5mpkCAPJaSD8uMDll2BgbJipdJSWA=; path=/; Httponly; Secure Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: sameorigin X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Simulateur Activité partielle | Portail des politiques publiques de l’emploi et de la formation professionnelle

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: simulateurap.emploi.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Accept-Ranges: bytes Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 29 Oct 2023 05:38:45 GMT Etag: "1932-52e42e7d88800-gzip" Last-Modified: Thu, 17 Mar 2016 18:36:16 GMT Referrer-Policy: strict-origin Set-Cookie: BIGipServerpool-dgefp-simuap.cegedim.cloud-HTTP=!L7LeVXxOuc/yEgkm0zi0rVXmcSp4PUVTUngZetd25WdDrxZjDS8T3u6x3YelivPoaEvEwVmqJbZavTpNtLSaW3EVP0o=; path=/; Httponly; Secure Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: sameorigin X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Simulateur Activité partielle | Portail des politiques publiques de l’emploi et de la formation professionnelle
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: simulateurap.emploi.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://simulateurap.emploi.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: Mismatched SSL Certificate
author: pdteam
info.description: Mismatched certificates occur when there is inconsistency between the common name to which the certificate was issued and the domain name in the URL. This issue impacts the trust value of the affected website.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
